title: Physical Fitness / Coach Website with Home, Tools, and Contact Pages

requirements.text: Create a multi-page frontend for a physical fitness / physical coach website with top navigation and routes for: Home, Tools, Contact Us, and at least one additional informational page (e.g., About or Services). All pages must be accessible via navigation and have clear page headings and sections.

quotes: Create me a web page that has its necessary tools. A physical fitness/physical coach website. Provide its tools, home page, contact us, and etc.

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation is visible site-wide and includes links to Home, Tools, Contact Us, and one additional page.
Each route renders without errors and shows a clear title/header for the page.
The site is usable on mobile and desktop screen sizes (responsive layout).

requirements.text: Design and implement a coherent visual theme for the full website (colors, typography, spacing, buttons, cards) appropriate for a fitness coaching brand, and apply it consistently across all pages. Avoid a blue/purple primary palette unless explicitly requested later.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent header/nav, typography scale, button styles, and card/section styling.
Primary brand color is not blue/purple (unless later requested).
Contrast and readability are acceptable for typical body text and buttons.

requirements.text: Implement the Home page content sections suitable for a fitness coach website, including at minimum: hero section (headline + subtext + primary call-to-action), coach/services overview, highlights/benefits section, and a call-to-action linking to Tools and Contact Us.

quotes: Provide its tools, home page, contact us, and etc.

acceptanceCriteria: Home page contains hero + overview + highlights + CTA sections.
Primary call-to-action navigates to Contact Us or Tools.
All content is in English and uses fitness-coaching appropriate copy.

requirements.text: Build a Tools page that provides practical fitness tools implemented in the UI (no external integrations required). Include at least: BMI calculator (height/weight inputs with unit selection), daily calorie estimate calculator (basic BMR/TDEE estimate with activity level), and a simple weekly workout planner template (user fills days/exercises and can export/copy).

quotes: Create me a web page that has its necessary tools.

acceptanceCriteria: BMI calculator accepts inputs, validates them, and displays BMI value with a basic category label (e.g., underweight/normal/overweight/obese).
Calorie estimate calculator accepts inputs (sex, age, height, weight, activity level), validates them, and displays an estimated daily calorie number.
Workout planner allows users to fill/edit a 7-day plan and provides a way to copy/export the plan text (e.g., copy-to-clipboard).

requirements.text: Create a Contact Us page with a contact form (name, email, message) including client-side validation, success/error states, and submission to the backend for storage. Also display basic contact information blocks (e.g., email/phone placeholders) and optional business hours.

quotes: Provide its tools, home page, contact us, and etc.

acceptanceCriteria: Contact form validates required fields and email format before submission.
On successful submission, the user sees a confirmation message and the form resets or disables appropriately.
On failure, an error message is displayed without crashing the page.
Submitted inquiries are persisted in the backend and can be retrieved via a backend method (for verification/testing).

requirements.text: Backend: implement data models and actor methods to store and retrieve Contact Us submissions. Each stored inquiry must include: id, name, email, message, and createdAt timestamp.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a method to create a new contact inquiry and returns the created id (or created record).
Backend exposes a method to list stored inquiries (suitable for testing; can be public for now).
Records include createdAt timestamps set by the backend at write time.

requirements.text: Add a basic footer and standard site layout elements (header/nav + footer) reused across pages, including links to Home, Tools, Contact Us, and the additional informational page.

quotes: Provide its tools, home page, contact us, and etc.

acceptanceCriteria: Footer appears on all routes and contains consistent navigation links.
Layout maintains consistent spacing and max-width rules across pages.

requirements.text: Add a lightweight on-site SEO/accessibility baseline: set meaningful page titles per route, ensure form inputs have labels, and ensure main sections use semantic headings.
acceptanceCriteria: Each page sets an appropriate document title (e.g., 'Home | [Site Name]', 'Tools | [Site Name]').
Contact form inputs have associated labels and show validation messages in text.
Pages use a sensible heading structure (one H1 per page; sections use H2/H3 as appropriate).

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets to support the fitness coach theme and render them in the UI (served from frontend/public/assets/generated), including a logo and a home hero banner image.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the Home page and site header/footer as appropriate.
Images render correctly in the built app without fetching from the backend.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose them instead.
Do not add third-party authentication providers; Internet Identity is the only supported auth (not required for this request).
nonGoals: Integration with external fitness APIs, wearables, or calendars.
Personalized AI coaching or LLM-based features.
Admin dashboard for managing inquiries (beyond a simple backend list method for verification).

required: Fitness coaching logo mark, modern minimalist (coach-logo.dim_512x512.png)
High-energy fitness hero banner with abstract shapes and subtle texture, no text (fitness-hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png)
Set of 3 simple line icons: dumbbell, stopwatch, heart/health (fitness-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)

preferencesToAdd: User-facing text must be in English.
